page.title: 04Employment
page.content: Employment Employment within the block is provided by Farming,Light Engineering,Motor repair ,Shops.Surgery,Painting and Decorating,Building trades,Restaurant and Public Houses,School,Dance Hall and Function rooms,Ornamental Windows. There are many one man bisiness and craft operators.Farming is mainly a family business,with one or two other workers employed on each farm,at peak times,especially in the market garden sector, casual staff are taken on.Light Engineering is centred mainly at Bryngwyn manor.There is also an Industrial Insulation firm based at Poole Springe Farm,employing 6 or 7 employees.Motor engineering is carried out at the garages at Much Birch and Wormelow,staffed by the proprietor and 1 mechanic.
